title: League of Legends freezes, then gives a buzzing noise right as I entered the game
body: I haven't had any problems with the game until recently. When I made a forced Windows update; (I am on Windows 10 laptop at the moment) I haven't been able to play games because I would freeze and hear a buzzing noise right as I entered the game. The only way I can get out is force restarting it by using the power button. I don't know if anyone has had this problem yet or before, but it is really frustrating me at the moment, and I would like a solution.

replies.body:
We've seen a decent amount of these lately. The Windows 10 Anniversary update enabled Game DVR within the Xbox Game Bar application. Unfortunately, it causes this issue for a small percentage of players, so I recommend [disabling the game bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) entirely to fix this.

Let me know if you have any questions.
You are my Lord and Savior
